title: The Top (album)
summary: The Top is the fifth studio album by English rock band The Cure, released on 30 April 1984 by Fiction Records. The album entered the UK Albums Chart at number ten on 12 May.[1]  Shortly after its release, the Cure embarked on a major tour of the United Kingdom, culminating in a three-night residency at the Hammersmith Odeon in London.
